sentences.en: A proteome is its full complement of proteins.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质组是指某一生物的全部蛋白质.

sentences.en: Each ship had a complement of around a dozen officers and 250 men.
sentences.cn: 每艘船的编制人数约为军官12位，船员250名。

sentences.en: John and Bob complemented each other well.
sentences.cn: 约翰和鲍勃互相配合得很好。

sentences.en: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentences.cn: 肉豆蔻、西芹和苹果酒都能很好地突出这些豆子的味道。

sentences.en: Political knowledge is a necessary complement to science in approaching solutions to these problems.
sentences.cn: 在寻找解决这些问题的方法时，需要有政治知识作为对科学知识的补充。

sentences.en: Rice makes an excellent complement to a curry dish.
sentences.cn: 有咖喱的菜配米饭最棒.

sentences.en: The dark red walls complement the red leather chairs.
sentences.cn: 深红色的墙和红色的皮椅很相配。

sentences.en: The green wall-paper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 绿色的墙纸完美地衬托出衣橱那年代久远的松木。

sentences.en: The green wallpaper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 绿色墙纸是旧松木梳妆台的完美衬托。

sentences.en: The rational and the irrational complement each other. Individually, they are far less powerful.
sentences.cn: 理性和非理性是互补的。两者分开的话，力量就会小很多。

sentences.en: The team needs players who complement each other.
sentences.cn: 球队需要能够相互取长补短的队员。

sentences.en: The two suggestions complement each other.
sentences.cn: 这两条建议相互补充.

sentences.en: The value of the complement of the secant is called the cosecant.
sentences.cn: 正割函数的倒数，称为余割函数。

sentences.en: There will be a written examination to complement the practical test.
sentences.cn: 会有一次书面考试来补充实践测试。

sentences.en: They oppose each other also complement each other.
sentences.cn: 它们相辅相成.

sentences.en: This wine would be a nice complement to grilled dishes.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒配烧烤食物会很不错。

sentences.en: Two discussions from different points of view may complement each other.
sentences.cn: 不同观点的两种讨论可以彼此互相参证.

sentences.en: We complement one another perfectly.
sentences.cn: 我们相互取长补短，堪称完美。

sentences.en: We've taken on our full complement of new trainees for this year.
sentences.cn: 我们今年招收的新学员已经满额了.

sentences.en: We've taken on our full complement of new trainees.
sentences.cn: 我们招收的新学员已经满额了.

sentences.en: Where is the man you could recommend for her complement?
sentences.cn: 你认为可以和她配成一对的男人在哪里?

trans.tran_cn: 补足物，补语，足额，编制名额
trans.tran_en: someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing
If people or things complement each other, they are different or do something different, which makes them a good combination
to make a good combination with someone or something else
